encyclopedia.content: 《vampire》是香港歌手林峰演唱的一首歌曲，是由周耀辉作词，邓智伟作曲，庄冬昕编曲的。该歌曲收录在专辑《Come 2 Me》中。

entry.tran: （传说和恐怖故事中在夜间离开坟墓吸食活人血的）吸血鬼
entry.def: A vampire is a creature in legends and horror stories. Vampires are said to come out of graves at night and suck the blood of living people.

means.word_mean: 1. (folklore) a corpse that rises at night to drink the blood of the living
